clean_data: IT Auditor Cyber Security Analyst span lITspan Auditor Cyber span lSecurityspan span lAnalystspan IT Auditor Cyber Security Analyst ClickHouse Consulting Brooklyn NY Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT Auditor Cyber Security Analyst ClickHouse Consulting February 2017 to Present Performing audits using COBIT COSO PCI DSS SSAE 18 HIPAA SOX and Cyber security Frameworks Have in depth experience performing audit with IT general controls ITGC such as access control change management IT operations disaster recovery and platform reviews Windows and UNIX OS Coordinating with IT department and external auditors during SOX IT testing Work with Engagement Team to identify and resolve client issues discovered during Audit and Review Process Testing and documentation of key SOX and IT General controls leveraging a defined process compliance monitoring process Assisting with walkthroughs and held meetings with client to discuss areas to be tested Access Risk Management Configuration Management Identity and Access Management Incident Response Contingency Planning and Security training Understand and report on control exception and deficiencies Produce automated work papers clearly documenting work performed Serving as the principle advisor to the Information System Owner and Authorizing Official on all matters involving security of the information systems Develop Security Assessment plan SAP according to NIST SP 80053A Determine security controls effectiveness ie controls implemented correctly operating as intended and meeting security requirements using the three basic methods of assessment Examine Interview and Test EIT Assess existing security policies processes and templates against NIST guidance Perform onsite security testing using vulnerability scanning tools such as Nessus Document findings in the Security Assessment Report SAR and Conduct risk assessments regularly ensured measures raised in assessments were implemented in accordance with risk profile and rootcauses of risks were fully addressed following NIST 80030 and NIST 80037 Develop NIST Compliant vulnerability assessments technical documentation and Plans of Action and Milestone POAM and Address System Weaknesses Ensure customers are in compliance with security policies and procedures following NIST 800 53 and NIST 80053A Business Development Officer Ghana Interbank Payment and Settlement Systems July 2016 to January 2017 ezwich support and training for Banks and Merchants Supported and trained most ezwich tellers and operators of most of the major banks and some rural bank branches on the ezwich platform Ensured that ezwich services are offered effectively and efficiently Similar support and training activities have been done for merchants with the Point of Sale POS device to ensure the smooth operation of ezwich for transactions at merchant points I have done ezwich support and training activities in Accra Cape coast Mankesim Koforidua Ho oda and Kade Leap Project I was part of a twoman team that piloted the implementation of payment of LEAP beneficiaries through the ezwich platform in the KwahuWest district I educated the LEAP beneficiaries about the ezwich acquisition usage and benefits of using the ezwich cards I also supervised the enrolment of the LEAP beneficiaries Education Masters in Management Information Systems GIMPA Accra Bachelors in Economics University of Ghana Accra Skills Share point Unix Excel Microsoft word Powerpoint security testing Microsoft Office SQL Sharepoint Additional Information COMPUTER SKILLS Microsoft word Excel Share Point Based System Operating Systems Windows and UNIX Teammate
